import React from 'react' import './CartItems.css' import remove_icon from '../Assets/cart_cross_icon.png' import all_product from '../Assets/all_product' const CartItems = () => { const {all_product,CartItems,removeFromeCart} = useContext(HomeContext); return (

Products

Title

Price

Quantity

Total

Remove

{all_product.map((e)=>{ if(CartItems[e.id]>0) { return

{e.name}

${e.new_price}

{e.new_price*CartItems[e.id]}

{removeFromCart}} alt="" />
} })}
) } export default CartItems
